text: kya unhen un logon ka vrtaant nahin pahuncha jo unase pahale guzare - nooh ke logo ka, aad aur samood ka, aur ibaraaheem kee qaum ka aur madayanavaalon ka aur un bastiyon ka jinhen ulat diya gaya? usake rasool unake paas khulee nishaaniyaan lekar aae the, phir allaah aisa na tha ki vah unapar atyaachaar karata, kintu ve svayan apane-aap par atyaachaar kar rahe the
